Marlène Boura

Marlène Boura is a postdoctoral researcher at UCLouvain, currently working in the project CO-HABITAT: Towards animal-inclusive design strategies in the Brussels Capital Region. She holds a PhD in Geography from the University of Luxembourg since 2021.

Her research interests are in urban ecology and landscape, urban forestry, urban biodiversity, ecosystem services and urban patterns. She also has a keen interest in modelling and data visualization.
